entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump The man who could have led the world through the pandemic like most presidents would have done let his ignorance & fragile ego get in his way. Governors and hospitals will continue to beg for help. People will continue to die. History will not be kind to him or the complicit GOP.
